end.title: Mary and Max
end.brief_description: A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York, for which Adam Elliot won an Academy Award.

constellations_other.name: Cosy correspondences
constellations_other.description: From anonymous love letters, pen-pals and magical deliveries, explore connections between films, TV series and videogames where sending letters and messages are at the heart of the story.

constellations_other.name: Culture and identity on the Australian screen
constellations_other.description: Australian screen culture is distinctive, unexpected, playful and serious when it matters. Indigenous productions make a huge contribution to the unique identity of the Australian moving image.
